title: My 7.1 patch doesn't want to download.
body:
when it starts patching it goes up to 30000 KBps and then it goes down to 0 and then an error shows up.


idk how to fix pls someone help me. :D

replies.body:
Depending on where this happens in the patching process, it could be caused by a few different factors. With the info I have available right now, I'd recommend going through our [**Patching Issues Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues) to address some common solutions for this.

If you encounter further issues afterward, let me know!
